page.title: PRIME - a world leader of premium concierge services and lifestyle management
page.content: • Concierge service 24/7/365 • Special conditions for accommodation in the best hotels of the world and business class flights • Development and organization of individual travel • Air tickets (booking, purchase, exchange) • Order of the VIP rooms and Fast track services in the airports of the world • Medical concierge • Club payment card PRIME World Elite MasterCard with access to all the PRIME privileges and benefits • Benefits in the best restaurants, boutiques, health and fitness centers, spas, beauty salons etc. • Booking in the most popular restaurants in the world • Organization of tickets and invitations to cultural, sporting and social events
